mapper.insert: insert into i_salary (base_pay, bonus, salary_year,payed, empno, created_by, created_time) values (#{basePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salaryYear,jdbcType=DATE},#{payed}, #{empno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update: update i_salary set base_pay = #{basePay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bonus = #{bonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payed = #{payed}, update_time = now(), update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = version+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, base_pay, bonus, merit, salary_year,payed, empno, created_by, created_time, update_time, update_by, version from i_salary where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, base_pay, bonus, merit, salary_year, empno, created_by, created_time, update_time, update_by, version from i_salary
select id, base_pay, bonus, merit, salary_year,payed, empno, created_by, created_time, update_time, update_by, version from i_salary where empno = #{empno} and salary_year = #{salaryYear}
